title: New: FTSE & Bipolar Sunshine – A Little Sumthin
body:
I’ve been listening to this one for the last week or so.

2 artists (from Leicester and Manchester respectively), that are gaining steam at the moment, **FTSE** and **Bipolar Sunshine**, combining via this buoyant and mellow little jam. It’s by no means flashy, its main successes come from its structure, composure and pleading hook, but in this simplicity it finds elegance, and finding that within a simple indie jam is hard to come by.
